glsa.title: OpenConnect: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in OpenConnect could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: OpenConnect is a free client for Cisco AnyConnect SSL VPN software.

description.p: A stack-based buffer overflow error has been discovered in OpenConnect.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious VPN server, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenConnect users should upgrade to the latest version:
